description: This RFx is for the procurement of Labour, Materials, Tools, Transportation, Equipment and Supervision for Pavement Repair and Installation. The Pavement must be in good condition when supplied, which is demarked as a predefined tolerance for services from acquisition date.
full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer: Pavement Repairs and Installation
==============================================

**Request for Standing Offer Title:** 
W4M00-23C329 – Pavement Repairs and Installation for the Department of National Defence, Winnipeg, Manitoba

**Solicitation Number:** WS4482105071

**Tender Closing Date:** 
2024-04-23T14:00:00 (Expired)

**UNSPSC Code:** 72141103 – Highway and Road Paving Service
**Procurement Method:** Competitive

**Summary of Work:**
The proposed standing offer covers the supply of all labor, materials, tools, transportation, equipment and supervision necessary to repair damaged sections of flexible pavements used for roads, parking lots, and sidewalks on an as-and-when-required basis at various locations for the Department of National Defence (DND) in Winnipeg, Manitoba.

**Key Specifications:**

* UN/CEFACT Code: 72141103
* UNSPSC Description: High-Way and Road Paving Service
* Regions of Delivery: Manitoba

**Contracting Entity Information:**

* Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec - K1A 0S5
* Procurement Category: CNST (Construction and Service Trade)

**Notice Information:**

* Tender Notice URL: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19051888/?extsite=MTkwNTE4ODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
* Contact Information: Alex Tikhonovitch,alex.tikhonovitch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
